name: Intergalactic National Championship (Edwin Sanchez)
description:
Local two player twin stick shooter. 

Gameplay: Twin stick shooter between 2 spaceships, local Player v.s Player.

Controls: Xbox controller required, left analog stick for moving, right analog stick for rotating/aiming, right bumper to fire.  

Credits: Edwin Sanchez,  Dalton Hyde,  Jesse McNamee,   Manuel Govea,  Wesley Gordon,   Jean P. Salman
